title: UCServiceUpdateStatus
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: UCServiceUpdateStatus

AzureADDeviceId.description: A GUID corresponding to the AAD Tenant to which the device belongs.

AzureADTenantId.description: A GUID corresponding to this device's AAD Device ID

DeploymentApprovedTime.description: The datetime of when the update deployment was approved.

DeploymentId.description: The identifier of the Deployment that is targeting this update to this device, else empty.

DeploymentIsExpedited.description: Whether this content is being expedited by WUfB DS.

DeploymentName.description: Friendly name of the created deployment.

DeploymentRevokeTime.description: The datetime of when the update deployment was Revoked.

OfferReadyTime.description: DateTime of OfferReady transition. If empty, not yet been Offered.

PolicyCreatedTime.description: The datetime of when the policy was created.

PolicyId.description: The policy identifier targeting the update to this device.

PolicyName.description: Friendly name of the created update policy.

ProjectedOfferReadyTime.description: Projected time update will be Offered to device. If empty, unknown.

ServiceState.description: High-level state of update's status relative to device, service-side.

ServiceSubstate.description: Last-known state of this update relative to the device, from the client (the device's WDD).

ServiceSubstateRank.description: Ranking of Substates for sequential ordering in funnel-type views. The rankings between ServiceSubstate and ClientSubstate can be used together.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

TargetBuild.description: The full build of the content this DeviceUpdateEvent is tracking. For Windows 10 updates, this would correspond to the full build (10.0.14393.385).

TimeGenerated.description: Time at which this event is generated.

UdpateIsSystemManifest.description: Signifies if update is a system manifest.

UpdateCategory.description: The type of content this DeviceUpdateEvent is tracking.

UpdateClassification.description: Whether this content is an Upgrade (FU), Security (QU), NonSecurity (QU).

UpdateDisplayName.description: The long-form display name for the given update. Varies on content type (FU/QU).

UpdateId.description: Update ID of the targeted update.

UpdateManufacturer.description: Manufacturer of update. Microsoft for WU FU/QU, for D&F name of driver manufacturer e.g. NVIDIA.

UpdateProvider.description: Update provider of drivers and firmware, eg. Microsoft.

UpdateRecommendedTime.description: The datetime of when the update was recomemnded to the device.

UpdateVersion.description: Update version of drivers and firmware.

UpdateVersionTime.description: Update version time of drivers and firmware.
